title: 21 Emon Uchuu e Irasshai!
synopsis: The story tells the adventures of the boy, 21 emon, engaged in the management of a hotel belonging to his family for years. In his problems, 21 emons is helped by the robot Gonsuke and the little alien Monga.
staff: [['Shibayama, Tsutomu', ['Director']], ['Inoue, Kazuhiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kimotsuki, Kaneta', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Sugiyama, Kazuko', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
